Package utils

All POJO's invoked by Servlets and Java Server Pages

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FileUtils
    Set of methods to handle IO file operations.
    FolderUtils  
    SaxHandler  
    SaxParser
    Utility class to quickly traverse a (metadata) file and return a list of values
    SaxToDom
    Class to trim a large metadata file keeping only objects associated with the selected subject area
    SaxToDomHandler  
    SimpleFile
    Simplified abstraction of a file
    XMLUtils
    XML Utilities
